verses.text: \w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Elias, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shew thyself \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Achab, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* Elias \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* shew \w himself|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Achab, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* there \w was|strong="H7458"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* grievous \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Achab \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Abdias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* governor \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w now|strong="H1961"\w* Abdias feared \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4325"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Jezabel killed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w caves|strong="H4631"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fed \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* Achab \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Abdias: Go \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w fountains|strong="H4599"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* see \w if|strong="H0194"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* save \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* utterly \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* \w between|strong="H5674"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* might \w go|strong="H1980"\w* round \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: Achab \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* Abdias \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w himself|strong="H0905"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* Abdias \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, Elias \w met|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* knew \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Art thou \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* Elias?

\w And|strong="H0452"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*. \w Go|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H0452"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: Elias \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wouldst \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Achab, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* liveth, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, whither \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* all \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w here|strong="H8033"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w every|strong="H1471"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou wast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* thou sayest \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0113"\w*: \w Go|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: Elias \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* Achab, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w finding|strong="H4672"\w* thee, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* infancy.

Hath \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* Jezabel \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w caves|strong="H4631"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fed \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* thou sayest: \w Go|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: Elias \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*: \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* may \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H2026"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elias \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* liveth, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shew myself unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

Abdias therefore \w went|strong="H7125"\w* \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* Achab, \w and|strong="H5046"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*: \w and|strong="H5046"\w* Achab came \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* Elias.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Art thou \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* troublest \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w troubled|strong="H5916"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* Baalim.

Nevertheless \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* groves \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* Jezabel’s \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

Achab \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elias \w coming|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* halt \w between|strong="H5704"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* sides? \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w then|strong="H6030"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* again \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w only|strong="H0905"\w* \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* bullocks \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* bullock \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* dress \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* bullock, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* ye \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* answering \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H1961"\w* very \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w*.
